content: @Nikita Popov Do you think it would be worth it to try to backport the LLVM commit from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86758#issuecomment-888595051 (it's included in LLVM 13). Doing so would unblock https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/81825
Or do you expect the LLVM 13 upgrade PR to be merged soon?

Assuming there are no complicated dependencies involved here (doesn't looks like it), I'd definitely go for the backport. LLVM major version updates can take a long time, depending on how bad the release is.
